title: Tomato ragù
description: A basic tomato sauce that can used with pasta, meatballs, or on grilled chicken or lamb.
tips: This ragu is great for freezing.

default: 1 x 800g tin plum tomatoes (or 2 x 400g tins)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Finely chop the celery, carrots and onions, fry them gently in a large tall pan in olive oil until softened and golden-brown.
Add the tomatoes, basil, bay leaf, tomato purée, water, salt and freshly ground black pepper.

Mix well, cover with a lid and allow to simmer on a low heat for approximately 30 minutes. (Make sure you stir occasionally). You can blend this sauce with a handheld stick blender (removing the bay leaf first!) or leave it chunky.
